EmailTemplate.subject: Let’s Chat About Better Pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
My name is Lorne, I’m an inside account manager at Grand & Toy. While we currently face challenging times, businesses will be reopening soon, but are you ready? I want to do whatever I can to help you be prepared to get back to business. So, I’ve been doing research and reaching out to customers like you that may need extra support.
My goal in reaching out is to help you save on essentials your business needs now and in the future. I’d like you to have a look at 2 new price plans that can provide you with this value. They will provide you with savings usually reserved for larger businesses, with no contract and no annual fee.
You’ll be able to save on solutions across all office essentials, including Paper and Cleaning & Maintenance products. Plus, we’ll guarantee that you’ll save 10% to 15% each year by signing up.
Take a closer look at the plans here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Pricing-Plan_Price-Plan-April-2020-Lorne.html]]>. Simply click on the plan that works best for you and your price plan will be updated within 1-2 business days. You’ll receive a confirmation email once the set-up has been completed.
Please reach out to me if you have any questions. Plus, I’m working from home and would love to chat!
Kind Regards,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager
